drug.name: haemophilus influenzae type b conjugate vaccine inj VIAL

instruction.value: for 3 doses: Administer a cycle of 3 doses beginning at 2 months of age, administer the second dose 2 months later and administer the third dose 2 months following the second dose.
for 2 doses; ONCE, followed by a second dose one month later.

Population.value: INFANT, aged 6 to 12 months; previously unvaccinated.
